item.title: About
item.description: CONTEXT My name is Jason Dexter and I’m an R-Programmer and Data-Analyst based out of Berkeley, CA, where I live with my lovely wife ğŸ’ƒ and our two cats ğŸˆ ğŸˆ In graduate school I was introduced to programming, first base-R then Python. Programming was difficult at first, then I began to resonate with the idea ğŸ’¡ of solving problems programmatically. Now I’m a nerd ğŸ¤“ when it comes to automation - there’s something intoxicating about the process of wrangling data using code - it’s simply amazing!
